<p>EnterElysium is a variety YouTuber and streamer who plays anything from Rimworld and Europa Universalis to of course Kerbal Space Program. In fact, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been playing Kerbal Space Program for years and so he knows his orbital mechanics quite well.</p><p>Check him out on <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/enterelysium"><b>Twitch</b></a>!<br/></p>
You didn't even mention how he makes WWK! There's like 35 war episodes, plus 14 episodes of modded career tie-in and even 5 episodes of a Spore tie-in. And he's still making it!
I have no interest in the "Military Thing" How about high-lighting a good "Vanilla player" for once?
